title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
description: A refreshing salad with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese, dressed with lemon and olive oil.

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes, and finely chop red onion and parsley.

instructions.title: Mix Dressing
instructions.description: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, prepared vegetables, olives, and feta cheese.

instructions.title: Add Dressing
instructions.description: Pour dressing over salad and toss to combine. Garnish with additional parsley if desired.

notes: For meal prep, keep the dressing separate until ready to serve.
Add grilled chicken or shrimp for extra protein.
Can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

title: One-Pot Creamy Chicken Pasta
description: A simple and delicious pasta dish made with tender chicken, creamy sauce, and fresh spinach, all in one pot!

instructions.title: Prepare Chicken
instructions.description: Cut chicken into 1-inch pieces. Season with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Saut√© Chicken
instructions.description: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chicken and cook until golden, about 5-6 minutes. Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.

instructions.title: Add Liquids and Pasta
instructions.description: Add chicken broth, heavy cream, and Italian seasoning. Bring to a simmer. Add pasta and ensure it's fully submerged.

instructions.title: Cook Pasta
instructions.description: Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pasta is al dente and sauce has thickened.

instructions.title: Add Spinach and Cheese
instructions.description: Stir in spinach and cook until wilted. Remove from heat and stir in parmesan cheese. Season with additional salt and pepper if needed.

notes: For a lighter version, substitute half-and-half for the heavy cream.
Add mushrooms or sun-dried tomatoes for extra flavor.
Sprinkle with fresh basil before serving for a pop of color and flavor.

title: Berry Banana Smoothie Bowl
description: A delicious and nutritious breakfast bowl packed with mixed berries, banana, and topped with granola and nuts.

instructions.title: Blend Base
instructions.description: In a blender, combine frozen berries, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey. Blend until smooth and thick.

instructions.title: Transfer to Bowl
instructions.description: Pour the smoothie mixture into a bowl. It should be thick enough to eat with a spoon.

instructions.title: Add Toppings
instructions.description: Top with granola, sliced almonds, chia seeds, and fresh berries.

notes: For a vegan version, use coconut yogurt instead of Greek yogurt.
Add a scoop of protein powder for extra protein.
Freeze the banana for an extra thick and cold smoothie bowl.
